mainSequence.step: Logic initiates the puzzle-solving process at the temple.
Logic determines the correctness of the result.
If the answer is correct, Command gains access.
Logic moves to the next room in the specified direction.
If the answer is incorrect, Command moves back to the previous room.
If facing a creature, Logic initiates combat.
If possessing the weapon, Logic grants access.
Command moves to the next room as directed.
If not possessing the weapon, Logic moves Command back to the previous room.
